TopicTitle: Can't take control of detatchable probe

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I have made a craft that works fine for getting to minmus and back. My plan is to fly it to minmus, detatch a probe while in orbit, then return the main craft and leave the probe there. I have plopped a simple prob design on the top of my ship, but when I detatch it in orbit I can't take control of it! Right clicking on it does nothing. I have tested the probe separately and it seems fine. Can anybody tell me what im doing wrong?

Here's a photo:

Edited September 27, 2013 by MDGM
Do you know that to switch ship you have to use a special key ? Look at the key biding
Yup that did it. Doi! Thanks
Use [ and ] keys to switch between nearby ships. Or you can switch in map view by left-clicking on the ship's icon and selecting "switch to". Or you can use tracking station.

Use the quick switch keys to go back and forth between nearby crafts and debris.

Square brackets are the keys used by default: [ ]
